channel.title: opinion on Ruben Krueger

item.title: Coming Home
item.description: At night, I left my house and looked up. The stars were white pinpoint holes in the dark sky, distant beyond my comprehension. I looked down. Through some hedges, I saw the busy street I live next to. Each car zoomed past, spewing noxious fumes as the drivers rushed to get home. Like them, I had driven through traffic to an office, typed on a computer, and driven through traffic back home.
